Lomotil Doasge - 2 tablets or 10 mL (5 mg of diphenoxylate), orally, 4 times a day or Florastor Doasge - One capsule orally two times daily.
Diclofenac Dosage - 50 mg orally 3 times a day or Asprin Dosage - 2.4-3.6 g/day
Benzonate Dosage - 100 mg to 200 mg orally three times a day as needed for cough or Benadryl Dosage - 1 or 2 tablets every 12 hours. Do not exceed 4 tablets in 24 hours.
Antacid Dosage - Take this medication by mouth, usually after meals and at bedtime as needed or Doslax Dosage - Take 1 tablet after food , twice a day
Buscopan 10mg Dosage - 0.2 to 0.4mg per day orally or you can also have Doxinate Dosage - Take 2 tablets in bedtime

If your age is below 25 then take paracetamol twice a day
If your age is above 25 take Anaprox 550 , taken only once daily.
